job_title: Software Engineer, GPU Capture & Replay Tools
job_description:
• Good low level C/C++ programming skills, such as in coding for fast execution using light weight data structures and efficient algorithms, bit manipulation, pointer, array, class, virtual function, etc.
• Experienced with Linux DRI and/or Windows WDDM.
• Experienced with scripting/automation using Python.
• Experienced with gdb/kdb.
• Experience in some of these areas are preferred: 3D graphics rendering and shader algorithms, techniques such as forward and deferred rendering, anti-aliasing, culling, and performance trade-offs.
• Experience with GPU compute (ROCm, OpenCL, CUDA, etc.
• This enables us to remember your preferences (for example, your choice of language or region) or when you register on areas of the Sites, such as our web programs or extranets.
• Undergrad degree required.

job_title: Exterior Trim Mechanical Design & Release Engineer
job_description:
• Serve as a vital link between design and engineering, working hand-in-hand with our studio team to shape high-quality A-surfaces that meet stringent Design for Manufacturability (DFM) requirements while maintaining Vehicle theme & Brand value.
• Experience taking components from initial concept and CAD design through validation testing and production launch.
• Adept in quantitative, qualitative, organizational, and communication skills.
• Hands-on experience in design through the manufacturing/fabrication process, either through curriculum or extracurricular projects.
• Collaborate with diverse teams to overcome challenges and craft integrated design solutions that meet all system requirements.
• Bachelor’s Degree in Mechanical Engineering (Masters Preferred) 2-4+ years of relevant automotive design experience.
• The ability to work closely with Design Studio, translating artistic vision into feasible engineering solutions.
• Strong logical reasoning.
